item.title: FastKV: KV Cache Compression for Fast Long-Context Processing with Token-Selective Propagation
item.description: FastKV: A novel KV cache compression method speeds up long-context LLM processing 2x by selectively propagating tokens and using GQA-aware compression, maintaining accuracy.
